attributes.title: Just no✨

Also Donald trump is racist and we don’t like racism in 2020 or any other year that is going to come.

attributes.title: the Worst ❤️Not surprised👄✨

attributes.title: hot cheeto man stealer🍤
attributes.review: i went to meijer to get some hot cheetos and i walked into the chip aisle and i saw them but when i got closer it was not a hot cheeto it was donald trump. he proceeded to tell me i can’t buy any hot cheetos until i vote for him. i told him i was not going to vote for him and left when i got home i was trying to heat up my cheetos like everyone does and then i realized...  HE STOLE MY MICORWAVE!!! so then i also saw he put my muffins in the freezer and i was very upset so in conclusion do not download this app or vote for the hot cheeto.😛👆
